message: "/t convo<tab>ad/<tab>7" is nicer (keeping in mind that it's interactive and lists everything for you)
yes username too (you've just misspelled my username btw ;)

but more importantly, /t group/topic. i suppose it should work like this: /t <tab> gives you what /ts does at this moment. /t gro<tab> completes group names. /t group1/<tab> is /ts group1. /t group1/12<tab> completes topic number
True, and as things scale and the convoread "firehose" is covering 10-50 topics, it'll become onerous.
anyway this feature will be implemented later on... :)
new tasks on the TODO list: /t group/topic autocompletion, @username
@vlasovkikh I'm getting the impression you might've opened a big ol' can o' worms. +)
completion is a nice feature to have and it's easy to implement with the standard readline module
"/t 7527" is not a nice command to type every time ;)
@muraii btw your suggestings on help messages are already in the github repo :)
Sweet. I'll fetch tomorrow. Maybe convoread will be good for mento learn from.
